Title: Enacts the "statewide building energy disclosure act"
Summary: Provides for reporting by utilities and owners of buildings meeting certain thresholds regarding energy consumption data; requires NYSERDA to create a list of buildings subject to such requirements; provides exemptions; requires public reporting on the information collected; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง1886, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to enacting the "statewide building energy disclosure act"
